casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Edward Lee MEDLEY. No. 348P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of October 2007 by Defendant to Dismiss Petition for Writ of Mandamus:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2007."
